title: Greetings
content:
Just thought I would drop in and say hello to those on Typophile.

I look forward to some sensible, upfront discussions on design.

Thanks

D!!

author: Dancer

comments.content:
Now see, I shoulda posted something like this a month ago...

Oh well...

Welcome, although I’m hardly a spokesperson here.

Peace,  
JT

Welcome Dancer with Flowers.  
By the way, I am taking care of 17 Sweet Dancers.  
Happy Dancing with Flowers
